meanings.definition: A skullcap worn by Jewish men as a sign of religious devotion.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, all the men wore yarmulkas.
meanings.sent2: He always puts on his yarmulkas before going to the synagogue.
meanings.sent3: The yarmulkas at the party added a touch of tradition to the celebration.
meanings.sent4: The yarmulkas in the crowd stood out like small, round beacons of faith.
meanings.sent5: The colorful yarmulkas made a vibrant display of religious commitment.

meanings.sent1: She bought a dozen yarmulkas for the family gathering.
meanings.sent2: The box was filled with various yarmulkas for the event.
meanings.sent3: The yarmulkas on the table looked like a collection of tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the chatter of people discussing the yarmulkas.
meanings.sent5: The yarmulkas were neatly stacked, ready to be distributed among the guests.
